verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: numerous references] [ARGM-LOC: in his first State of the Union speech] [ARG2: to the MS-13 gang] . What is the gang 's presence like in Arizona ?
President Donald Trump made numerous references in his first State of the Union speech to the MS-13 gang . [ARG2: What] [V: is] [ARG1: the gang 's presence like in Arizona] ?
